titleStmt.title: A proclamation anent the mint, and declaring Spanish ryals current, at fifty six shilling Scots
Proclamations. 1683-07-04
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Edinburgh the fourth day of July, 1683. and of Our Reign the 35th year.
Arms 234; Steele notation: France, several Our.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
